room_title: Escape room "The Waco Escape Room" by Waco Escape Rooms in Waco
review: We had a great time with our grandsons. We were in the Waco room. We made it about 1/2 way before our time was up. We would love to try it again.

room_title: Escape room "The Waco Escape Room" by Waco Escape Rooms in Waco
review: This was a first for me and my crew. We got a group of 6 together for my birthday on Sunday and did the Waco Room. We didn't get out, but it was so freaking fun! We can't wait to come back we just can't agree on a di over or a different room lol! Too much fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Waco Escape Room" by Waco Escape Rooms in Waco
review: Waco escape rooms was amazing! Very hard to figure out but made working as a team so much fun! Amazing staff and amazing rooms! Fell in love with this place tonight! definitely coming back!

room_title: Escape room "The Waco Escape Room" by Waco Escape Rooms in Waco
review: I have used two other Escape Room companies in Denver, a bigger city. This was by far the best one!!! We were amazed by the intricate design and thoroughly enjoyed our time. We took a large group-9 and were challenged. It took all our talents and we probably couldn't have done it with a group of 4. (We did code breaker) Very affordable fun- we are still raving about it!
